title: ensure example schema.xml has some mention/explanation of per field similarity vs similarityprovider vs (global) similarity
description:
when SOLR-2338 was commited, there wasn't yet clear understanding of how much the new feature per field similarity fields (vs custom similarity provider (vs global similarity factory)) should be "advertised" in the example configs, and what type of usage should be encouraged/promoted.

it's likely that by the time 4.0 is released, new language specific field types will already demonstrate these features, and no additional "artificial" usages of them will be needed, but one way or another we should ensure that they are either demoed or mentioned in comments

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: we've already seen questions about this, so i'll make sure we have at least one example

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
